name: Game Master
author: Round
content: Amid a repetitive and boring everyday life, a game appeared as if it were fate - &quotHeroes Destiny&quot. After spending ten years playing it, I finally completed the game, but all that remained was the emptiness of having to return to an ordinary life. At that moment, a message appeared on the screen:&quotDo you desire a new adventure?&quot[Yes/No]Little did I know that I would wake up in an unfamiliar body and an unknown place.&quotRemember, I am now Calix Shaekin.&quotAnd thusâ€¦&quotI will be
